All Implemented Interfaces:

public class TalaMain
extends Activity
implements SliderView.SliderReceiver, SettingsFragment.OnOffReceiver, Tala_Constants, PopUpAdapter.PopUpCallbacks

the main class for the entire application starts the other services and tasks and maintains UI

Author:
Devin Frenze, Nora Hayes

onCreate

protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
